text: Cousins Subs is a "sub" shop that makes submarine sandwiches. It was created in the 1970s in Wisconsin. They opened their first restaurant in Milwaukee, at 60th Street and Silver Spring Drive. It closed after several years of success. The oldest Cousins Subs is on the corner of Brady Street and Farwell Avenue in Milwaukee. Category:American fast food restaurants Category:1970s establishments in the United States Category:20th-century establishments in Wisconsin
title: Cousins Subs
